name: Meteor And Me
description:
A meteor falling is a common thing, but sometimes they might bring something along with them.  

Game info: Make sure to look at control options. Game can be short, but it depends on what you want to do.  There are a few endings. "Game over" sequence does not count as an ending.

Won't add much else. You can keep the air of discovery.  The download link is for an executable. You won't need to use a browser to enjoy the game, and the it generally runs better.

I can be contacted at: 8bitwannabe@gmail.com
